statements: SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT student_id, subject, performance_score, exam_date FROM StudentPerformance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, subject FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY exam_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE subject = 'Math' AND exam_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS average_score, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM StudentPerformance WHERE subject = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY exam_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(performance_score) AS max_score FROM StudentPerformance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 1;
SELECT subject, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM StudentPerformance GROUP BY subject ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subject FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT grade_id, subject, score FROM grades WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject, score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC, score DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE gender = 'F' AND date_of_birth < '2003-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT student_name, grade_level, subject, score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE score >= 80 AND subject = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY grade_level DESC, score DESC;

SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth, subject, score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC, score DESC;

SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth, subject, score FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade_level = 12 OR (subject = 'Science' AND score < 60) ORDER BY grade_level ASC, score ASC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT name, gender FROM students WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT subject_name, difficulty_level FROM subjects ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC
SELECT name, exam_date, score FROM students JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01'
SELECT * FROM students JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id WHERE gender='female' AND score > 80 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT students.name, subjects.subject_name, performance.score FROM students INNER JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id INNER JOIN subjects ON performance.subject_id = subjects.subject_id WHERE subjects.field='Science' AND performance.score >= 70 ORDER BY students.name ASC, performance.score DESC;

SELECT students.name, subjects.subject_name, performance.exam_date FROM students JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id JOIN subjects ON performance.subject_id = subjects.subject_id WHERE students.gender='male' AND subjects.difficulty_level < 3 ORDER BY performance.exam_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT students.name, COUNT(*) AS num_subjects FROM students JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id JOIN subjects ON performance.subject_id = subjects.subject_id GROUP BY students.name HAVING num_subjects > 3 ORDER BY students.name DESC;

SELECT students.name, AVG(performance.score) AS avg_score FROM students JOIN performance ON students.student_id = performance.student_id WHERE students.date_of_birth >= '1995-01-01' GROUP BY students.name HAVING avg_score > 85 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT subject_name FROM subjects WHERE subject_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_id, subject_id, score FROM student_subject_scores WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT s.student_name, subj.subject_name, s.gender FROM students s JOIN subjects subj ON s.student_id = 1 AND subj.subject_id = 1;
SELECT sp.student_id, sh.performance_rating FROM student_performance_history sh JOIN student_subject_scores sp ON sh.student_id = sp.student_id WHERE sp.score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT subject_name FROM subjects WHERE subject_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name, teaching_subject FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_date, title, total_points FROM assignments WHERE subject_id = 1 AND teacher_id = 1 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM students WHERE gender = 'M' AND birth_date < '2000-01-01' ORDER BY first_name ASC;

SELECT s.subject_name, t.first_name AS teacher_first_name, t.lastjson_name AS teacher_last_name FROM subjects s JOIN assignments a ON s.subject_id = a.subject_id JOIN teachers t ON a.teacher_id = t.teacher_id;

SELECT e.enrollment_id, e.enrollment_date, s.subject_name, st.first_name AS student_first_name, st.last_name AS student_last_name, a.title AS assignment_title FROM enrollments e JOIN subjects s ON e.subject_id = s.subject_id JOIN students st ON e.student_id = st.student_id JOIN assignments a ON e.subject_id = a.subject_id WHERE e.grade >= 80;
